text: Desensitized may refer to: * Desensitized (Pitchshifter album), 1993 * Desensitized (Drowning Pool album), 2004 * "Desensitized", a song by Green Day from Shenanigans * "Desensitized", a song by The Mighty Mighty Bosstones from Let's Face It * Desensitized, an album by Darker Half, 2011 == See also == * Desensitization (disambiguation)
title: Desensitized
